entities.name: NeuraHealth Solutions
background: NASDAQ-listed healthcare AI company founded in 2014
Specializes in AI-driven diagnostic systems and clinical tools
Headquarters in San Francisco with 2,460 employees
Key products: FDA-pending MediScan and HIPAA-compliant NeuraHealth Cloud
2023 revenue: $870M with 136.4 P/E ratio

entities.name: Dr. Eliza Chen
background: CMO at NeuraHealth since 2015 and AI diagnostics co-founder
Neurology specialist with Stanford Health research experience
Published 12+ papers on ML in medical imaging
Holds MD and neurology board certifications

entities.name: Marcus Williams
background: CEO of NeuraHealth Solutions since 2014
MIT CS graduate and Harvard MBA
Forbes 40 Under 40 in Healthcare Tech (2018)
UCSF Medical AI advisory board member

entities.name: FDA
background: Regulates U.S. medical devices and pharmaceuticals
Requires approval for Class III AI software like MediScan
Maintains public database of cleared AI medical devices
Collaborates with NIST on healthcare AI standards
